sourcesContent: import{useMemo as o}from"react";import{useRadioGroupState as r}from"@react-stately/radio";import{useRadioGroup as a}from"@react-aria/radio";export const useRadioGroup=t=>{const{size:i="md",color:e="default",labelColor:l="default",orientation:d="vertical",isRequired:s,validationState:p,...u}=t,n=o((()=>({...u,orientation:d})),[u]),c=r(n),{radioGroupProps:m,labelProps:f}=a(n,c);return{size:i,color:e,orientation:d,labelColor:l,isRequired:s,validationState:p,radioGroupState:c,radioGroupProps:m,labelProps:f}};
